name: MissionPlayer Game File
summary: Learn about .PLAYMISSION files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PLAYMISSION files are used for storing and running the executable version of the mission.

description: Game file used by MissionPlayer, an application used to play 3D first-person perspective games created by the MissionMaker software; contains a playable game exported from a .MISSION file in MissionMaker.
